title: A Day in the Life of a Dairy Farm

abstract: Spend a day with the Calders on their dairy farm and observe the day to day life of a dairy farm. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from South Gippsland'.
description: From sunrise to sunset, seven days a week, 365 days a year, a dairy farmer knows no rest. Spend a day with Les and Louise Calder on their dairy farm and observe a typical day's activities. From artificial insemination to feeding and twice daily milking, come rain, hail or shine, these farmers work from dusk till dawn, everyday.
